details.arabic_diacless: رضيت باللٰه ربا، وبالإسلام دينا وبمحمد صلى اللٰه عليه وسلم نبيا
details.arabic: رَضِيْتُ بِاللّٰهِ رَبًّا، وَّبِالْإِسْلاَمِ دِينًا وَّبِمُحَمَّدٍ صَلَّى اللّٰهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ نَبِيًّا
details.transliteration: Radheetu billaahi Rabban, wa bil-'Islaami deenan, wa bi-Muhammadin (sallallaahu 'alayhi wa sallama) Nabiyyan.
details.translations: I am pleased with Allaah as a Lord, and Islaam as a religion and Muhammad as a Prophet.
details.bottom: Allah has promised that anyone who says every morning or evening will be pleased on the Day of Resurrection.

pageTitle: Pleasure of Allah in the day of judgment
